name: ERSATZ
description: ERSATZ is a speed focused Hardcore Action Platformer with a musical twist! Featuring an Original Electronic Soundtrack also by Paris Stalker, the game's creator, hear and feel the music build as you progress as hazards, obstacles, boss attacks and controller vibrations move to the ever present beat!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista and above Processor: 1.2 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 768mb video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space
